Title: Chapter Eight: The Upside Down
Writer: Matt Duffer (created by), Ross Duffer (created by), Matt Duffer (teleplay), Ross Duffer (teleplay), Paul Dichter (story)
Actors: Winona Ryder, David Harbour, Finn Wolfhard, Millie Bobby Brown
Plot: Joyce and Hopper are taken in for questioning. Nancy and Jonathan prepare to fight the monster and save Will.
